headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARVEY, JANYS ADAMS

snippet: HARVEY--Janys Adams, died on April 19, 2016. Ms. Harvey is survived by her husband, Howard G. Krane, and her children, Bennet Harvey (Lisa), Kyle Harvey, and Sasha Mayoras (Tyler), as well as her brother, Robert McC. Adams, Jr., sister, Mervyn Adams Seldon, and two stepdaughters, Marie Bergman and Hilary Krane. She was the grandmother of four. A memorial service will be on May 20 at 11:30am at the Casino Club in Chicago. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations to Barnard College, Office of Development, 3009 Broadway, New York, NY 10027. 1/3
